text: Karwai Tang / WireImage When Meghan Markle accepted Prince Harry's proposal, she knew that joining the royal family would be accompanied by her inevitable pitfalls. And Samotha Markle, her half sister, took the opportunity to add up her 2 pence ( and does not seem to have stopped talking – or tweeting – ever since ). But no amount of Duchess training could have been possible, possibly because Meghan was preparing for the bombing news that her father was also in contact with the press.
